3543630615.title: services:csghub:environment:CSGHUB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG:runner:enable 配置为true时登录出现502报错
3543630615.summary: services:csghub:environment:CSGHUB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG:runner:enable 配置为true时登录出现502报错 按照官方
3543630615.search_text:
services:csghub:environment:csghub_omnibus_config:runner:enable 配置为true时登录出现502报错 按照官方 https://opencsg.com/docs/csghub/101/install/install_csghub_by_docker 的部署说明，起了个实例，docker-compose配置如下

```
version: '3.3' # 建议加上 version 字段，以明确使用的版本
services:
  csghub:
    image: opencsg-registry.cn-beijing.cr.aliyuncs.com/opencsghq/omnibus-csghub:v1.10.0-ce
    environment:
      csghub_omnibus_config: |
        csghub:
          external_url: "http://10.1.110.47" # 访问 csghub 实例域名，建议使用域名方式配置
        casdoor:
          enable: true
          listen: "10.1.110.47:8000"    
        runner:                                                                                                                   # 仅使用完整功能时需要，基本功能安装可移除此项
          enable: true                                                                                    # 是否启用 runner 服务，禁用则仅能使用基础功能
          deploy:
            knative:
              services:
                - type: "nodeport"        # 如果 kubernetes 集群不支持 loadbalancer，可以使用 nodeport
                  domain: "app.internal"        # 自定义 knative serving 内部域名
                  host: "10.1.110.47"   # 暴露 kourier 服务的 external-ip
                  port: 30123                                                   # 自定义端口号，type=loadbalancer, 请指定为 80
    ports:
      - '80:80'                                 # nginx
      - '2222:2222'     # git over ssh
      - '5000:5000'     # container registry
      - '8000:8000'     # casdoor
      - '9000:9000'     # minio
      - '9001:9001'     # minio admin ui
    volumes:
      - ./csghub/etc:/etc/csghub
      - ./csghub/logs:/var/log/csghub
      - ./csghub/data:/var/opt/csghub
      - ./csghub/.kube:/etc/csghub/.kube
    restart: always
    shm_size: '256m'
```


如果把红框       runner:  enable: 配置设置为true是能显示页面，但登录时就会有请求下面的接口502的问题，检查casdoor的日志发现没有启动
http://10.1.110.47/api/v1/callback/casdoor?code=d081f6d246a8d6a27575&state=casdoor
状态代码:
502 bad gateway

设置为fasle就能正常登录进去管理模型和数据集

3405379595.title: Improve filter system: Limit tag selection to one per category
3405379595.summary:
Improve filter system: Limit tag selection to one per category ## Issue Description

The current
3405379595.search_text:
improve filter system: limit tag selection to one per category ## issue description

the current filter system allows users to select multiple tags within the same category (e.g., multiple framework tags or multiple task tags), but this creates a poor user experience due to the and filtering logic.

## current behavior

- users can select multiple tags within a single category
- filters use and logic across all selected tags
- example: selecting both "pytorch" and "tensorflow" frameworks returns only repositories that have both tags
- this often results in zero or very few results, creating frustration

## problems

1. **overly restrictive results**: multiple tags in the same category rarely coexist
2. **counter-intuitive ux**: adding more filters reduces results instead of expanding them
3. **poor discoverability**: users get empty result sets and may think the system is broken
4. **semantic confusion**: multiple framework/task selections don't make logical sense

## proposed solution

**option 1: single tag selection per category (recommended)**
- limit users to selecting only one tag per category
- selecting a new tag in the same category automatically deselects the previous one
- maintains clean, predictable filtering behavior
- aligns with user mental model (one task type, one framework, etc.)

**option 2: or logic within categories, and across categories**
- allow multiple tags per category but change filtering logic
- within category: or logic (pytorch or tensorflow)
- across categories: and logic (task=image-classification and (framework=pytorch or framework=tensorflow))
- more complex to implement and explain to users

## implementation details

for option 1 (recommended):

**frontend changes needed:**
- update tagsidebar.vue setactivetag() function
- change from array-based to single-value tag selection
- clear existing tag when new tag in same category is selected

**backend changes needed:**
- no changes required - existing api supports single tag per category

## acceptance criteria

- [ ] users can select only one tag per category
- [ ] selecting a new tag automatically deselects the previous tag in the same category
- [ ] ui provides clear visual feedback about selected tags
- [ ] url parameters continue to work correctly
- [ ] filter behavior is intuitive and predictable
- [ ] no breaking changes to existing api

## priority

**high** - this significantly impacts user experience and discoverability of content.

## related files

- frontend/src/components/tags/tagsidebar.vue
- frontend/src/components/tags/taglist.vue
- frontend/src/components/shared/repocards.vue
- docs/features/filter-system.md (contains detailed analysis)

## additional context

this issue was identified during comprehensive analysis of the filter system. the current multi-tag selection was likely implemented to be flexible, but in practice creates more problems than it solves for the typical user workflow.

3348387949.title: Bug Report: Error When Creating Application Space via Template
3348387949.summary:
Bug Report: Error When Creating Application Space via Template 
Describe the bug
When attempting to
3348387949.search_text:
bug report: error when creating application space via template 
describe the bug
when attempting to create an application space by following the template example in the csghub platform, an error occurs during the creation process. the operation fails to complete successfully, and no application space is created in the end. no detailed error message is displayed on the interface, making it difficult to identify the root cause directly.

environment

csghub version: csghub-1.10.0     v1.10.0-ce-ee
os: ubuntu 24.04.2 lts
hardware: 12c16g
launch method: helm


expected behavior
after submitting the configuration via the template, the application space should be created successfully. a confirmation message should be displayed, and the new application space should appear in the "application spaces" list, ready for further use.

screenshots

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c2bd3b42-3471-44e1-96ce-f9ebfae09b82)

3166603671.title: Calling csghub-sdk's upload_file cannot upload large files (all display success, small files can be uploaded normally)
3166603671.summary: Calling csghub-sdk's upload_file cannot upload large files (all display success, small files can be
3166603671.search_text:
calling csghub-sdk's upload_file cannot upload large files (all display success, small files can be uploaded normally) **describe the bug**
calling csghub-sdk's upload_file cannot upload large files (all display success, small files can be uploaded normally)

**environment**
csghub version: v1.7.0
os: linux
hardware: 32c128g
launch:  docker compose


**to reproduce**
steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. go to csghub-docker-compose/csghub
2. sudo ./configure (with csghub_with_k8s=0)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f7350c6e-c43f-4dc6-8c29-76a5c6381c49)
3. go to csghub-sdk/
4.  python examples/upload_file_local.py 
file './test.mp4' upload successfully.
it show successfully,but it didn't actually work.

the code is shown below：
from pycsghub.file_upload import http_upload_file
token = "1a1faxxxxxxxxxd3eebfca17b3b"
endpoint = "http://csghub.example.com"
repo_id = "root/test_m01"
repo_type = "model"
file_path = "./test.mp4"
result = http_upload_file(repo_id, endpoint=endpoint, token=token, repo_type='model', file_path=file_path)


if you use the official address（endpoint = "https://hub.opencsg.com"）, it will work.

3276296213.title: 登录以及casdoor登录
3276296213.summary:
登录以及casdoor登录 看readme大约是2025年1月左右的版本，因为现在的安装文档已经看不懂了，就想把这个恢复跑起来。
1、问题描述：

首先是docker-compose
keywords: 看readme大约是2025年1月左右的版本
因为现在的安装文档已经看不懂了
就想把这个恢复跑起来
3276296213.search_text:
登录以及casdoor登录 看readme大约是2025年1月左右的版本，因为现在的安装文档已经看不懂了，就想把这个恢复跑起来。
1、问题描述：

首先是docker-compose up以后，login会提示报错：
重定向 uri：http://xxx:8000/api/v1/callback/casdoor在许可跳转列表中未找到

但是找到了相关配置文件，./docker/etc/casdoor/目录下，看这个url是已经配置在redirecturis中的。

然后群里提问后，群里大佬说，直接的登录8000端口的casdoor试试
然后根据找到的账户密码，登录8000，提示用户不存在csghub，密码csghub@2025！

感谢解答！

3258359528.title: There is no problem in uploading a single model file of about 4G, but a single file larger than 4G will directly report an error.
3258359528.summary: There is no problem in uploading a single model file of about 4G, but a single file larger than 4G
3258359528.search_text:
there is no problem in uploading a single model file of about 4g, but a single file larger than 4g will directly report an error. 
**describe the bug**

after using helmchart to deploy in the k8s cluster, git lfs cannot upload a single model file larger than 4g through http or ssh.

**environment**
csghub version: v1.8.0｜1.9.0
os: linux 
hardware: 512c1024g
launch:  helm chart


**to reproduce**
steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. git clone xxx
2. git lfs install
3. git track "*.safesenter"
4. git lfs push

**expected behavior**
successfully uploaded

```

3238995084.title: 登录报错 500 Internal Server Error
3238995084.summary:
登录报错 500 Internal Server Error <!--
Please submit your issue in English to ensure it's addressed
3238995084.search_text:
登录报错 500 internal server error <!--
please submit your issue in english to ensure it's addressed promptly and efficiently.
-->
**bug描述**
注册正常，输入重复邮箱会提示邮箱占用；登录时输入错误密码也会提示。
但输入正确密码，界面等待，约20s后返回 500 internal server error 

详细信息
```
uncaught typeerror: cannot set properties of null (setting 'textcontent')
    at casdoor?code=db3d36d7290e6f64d8f0&state=casdoor:86:53
```
**环境**
csghub version: v1.9.0-ce
os: ubuntu
launch:  docker compose 

yml文件
```
services:
  csghub:
    image: opencsg-registry.cn-beijing.cr.aliyuncs.com/opencsghq/omnibus-csghub:v1.9.0-ce
    hostname: 'csghub.example.com'
    environment:
      csghub_omnibus_config: |
        csghub:
          external_url: "http://172.20.84.183" # 访问 csghub 实例域名，建议使用域名方式配置
        runner:														# 仅使用完整功能时需要，基本功能安装可移除此项
          enable: false										# 是否启用 runner 服务，禁用则仅能使用基础功能
          deploy:
            knative:
              services:
                - type: "nodeport"        # 如果 kubernetes 集群支持 loadbalancer，可以使用 loadbalancer
                  domain: "app.internal"	# 自定义 knative serving 内部域名
                  host: "192.168.18.10"   # 暴露 kourier 服务的 external-ip
                  port: 30123							# 自定义端口号，type=loadbalancer, 请指定为 80
    ports:
      - '80:80'					# nginx
      - '2222:2222'     # git over ssh
      - '5000:5000'     # container registry
      - '8000:8000'     # casdoor
      - '9000:9000'     # minio

    volumes:
      - csghub_etc:/etc/csghub
      - csghub_logs:/var/log/csghub
      - csghub_data:/var/opt/csghub

    restart: always
    shm_size: '256m'


volumes:
  csghub_etc:
  csghub_logs:
  csghub_data:
```

2639945546.summary:

Please submit your issue in
2639945546.search_text:
[model sync bug] the tags of models or datasets not been synced <!--
please submit your issue in english to ensure it's addressed promptly and efficiently.
-->
**describe the bug**

i deploy the csghub on my cumputer and tried to sync models from opencsg.com, after syned, i found that the tags of the model not been synced. 

**environment**
csghub version: v1.0
os: linux
launch:  docker compose 


**to reproduce**
steps to reproduce the behavior:

2729764589.title: Integrate CSGHub with dstack for apps, training, and inference
2729764589.summary: Integrate CSGHub with dstack for apps, training, and inference CSGHub integrates with Kubernetes,
2729764589.search_text:
integrate csghub with dstack for apps, training, and inference csghub integrates with kubernetes, ray, and knative to deploy apps, train models, and run model inference.

[dstack](https://github.com/dstackai/dstack) is a lightweight alternative to kubernetes, ray, and knative that could be a much better fit.

here are its key advantages:

1. `dstack` supports leading cloud gpu providers and makes it easy to add native support for new providers.
2. `dstack` simplifies the use of on-prem gpu machines compared to kubernetes.
3. `dstack` addresses many challenges related to deploying apps, managing endpoints, and scheduling complex training tasks.

by integrating with dstack, csghub users could experience up to a 10x simplification when connecting to cloud providers or on-prem clusters.

csghub version: v1.7.0

和技术人员沟通后更改如下：
services:
  csghub:
    image: opencsg-registry.cn-beijing.cr.aliyuncs.com/opencsg_public/omnibus-csghub:v1.8.0-ce
    hostname: 'csghub.example.com'
    environment:
      csghub_omnibus_config: |
        csghub:
          external_url: "http://csghub.example.com" # 访问 csghub 实例域名，建议使用域名方式配置
        runner:
          enable: false                                      # 是否启用 runner 服务，禁用则仅能使用基础功能
          deploy:
            knative:
              services:
                - type: "nodeport"        # 如果 kubernetes 集群支持 loadbalancer，可以使用 loadbalancer
                  domain: "app.internal"    # 自定义 knative serving 内部域名
                  host: "192.168.16.110"   # 暴露 kourier 服务的 external-ip
                  port: 30123                           # 自定义端口号，type=loadbalancer, 请指定为 80
        server:
          s3:
            endpoint: "192.168.16.110:9000"
            internal_endpoint: "127.0.0.1:9000"
    ports:
      - '80:80'                 # nginx
      - '2222:2222'     # git over ssh
      - '5000:5000'     # container registry
      - '8000:8000'     # casdoor
      - '9000:9000'     # minio
    volumes:
      - ./csghub/etc:/etc/csghub
      - ./csghub/logs:/var/log/csghub
      - ./csghub/data:/var/opt/csghub
      - ./csghub/.kube:/etc/csghub/.kube
    restart: always
    shm_size: '256m'

2968520551.title: Model download dialog supports click to execute commands via local terminal
2968520551.summary: Model download dialog supports click to execute commands via local terminal The current model
2968520551.search_text: model download dialog supports click to execute commands via local terminal the current model download dialog only provides basic command text, requiring users to manually copy and execute the commands in the terminal. this approach is inefficient and less user-friendly for those unfamiliar with command-line operations. ## proposed solution **click-to-execute local terminal commands**: - add a "copy and execute" button in the dialog, enabling users to directly execute related commands in their local terminal with a single click. - use web technologies (e.g., electron or browser extensions) to interact with the local terminal. ## expected benefits - enhance user experience by reducing the manual steps required. - make the process more user-friendly for those unfamiliar with command-line operations. - improve the efficiency and convenience of model downloads. ## priority it is recommended to prioritize the implementation of the click-to-execute functionality to significantly improve user operation efficiency.

import pandas as pd

data = {"id": [1, 2, 3], "name": ["alice", "bob", "charlie"], "age": [25, 30, 35]}

404 not found

it should be work well without 404.

2886387238.title: csghub-runner 服务无法被访问：DNS 解析错误
2886387238.summary:
csghub-runner 服务无法被访问：DNS 解析错误 



### 问题描述
在new spaces页面尝试访问集群信息时遇到以下错误：
```
failed to list
2886387238.search_text:
csghub-runner 服务无法被访问：dns 解析错误 



### 问题描述
在new spaces页面尝试访问集群信息时遇到以下错误：
```
failed to list cluster info, get "http://csghub-runner:8082/api/v1/cluster": dial tcp: lookup csghub-runner on 127.0.0.11:53: server misbehaving
```

这个错误表明系统无法解析 `csghub-runner` 主机名，或者无法连接到该主机的 8082 端口。

### 环境信息
- 部署方式：docker compose
- 版本：csghub 1.40

### 问题分析
从错误信息看，这是一个 dns 解析问题。虽然 `csghub-runner` 服务已在 docker-compose 配置中定义，但客户端无法通过 dns 将该主机名解析为有效 ip 地址。可能的原因：

1. dns 服务（coredns）配置问题
2. `csghub-runner` 服务暴露的端口与访问的端口不匹配
3. 网络配置问题，导致服务间无法正常通信

### 配置细节
在当前配置中：
- `csghub-runner` 服务使用了静态 ip `192.171.100.110`
- 该服务没有显式暴露 8082 端口
- 该服务依赖于 coredns 服务并使用其作为 dns 服务器 (`dns: - 192.171.100.102`)


### 期望的解决方案
希望能够正确解析 `csghub-runner` 主机名并连接到该服务的 api 端点。

### 补充信息
完整的 docker-compose 配置已提供，特别关注以下相关服务：
- csghub-runner

2025-02-28 02:31:30 +0000 [info]: init supervisor logger path=nil rotate_age=nil rotate_size=nil

2707481148.title: [Feature Request] Add Model Version Comparison Tool
2707481148.summary:
[Feature Request] Add Model Version Comparison Tool ### Overview
The current CSGHub platform would
2707481148.search_text:
[feature request] add model version comparison tool ### overview
the current csghub platform would benefit from a model version comparison tool that allows users to easily compare different versions of the same model, including their performance metrics, parameters, and deployment configurations.

### current behavior
- users need to manually check different model versions
- no side-by-side comparison of model metrics
- difficult to track changes between versions

### proposed solution
add a comparison feature that would:
- show side-by-side comparisons of model versions
- display key differences in parameters and configurations
- visualize performance metrics between versions
- include a diff view for model cards and configuration files

### user benefits
1. faster decision-making when choosing model versions
2. better version control and tracking
3. easier identification of performance improvements
4. enhanced model governance

### technical considerations
- integration with existing model management system
- database schema updates for storing comparison data
- ui/ux changes in the frontend (vue.js)
- api endpoints for comparison functionality

### acceptance criteria
- [ ] side-by-side comparison view implemented
- [ ] performance metrics visualization
- [ ] configuration diff viewer
- [ ] version history timeline
- [ ] export comparison results
- [ ] api documentation updated

### additional context
this feature aligns with csghub's goal of providing enterprise-level model management and would enhance the platform's compatibility with existing mlops workflows.

### environment
- csghub version: 1.1.0
- deployment: on-premise

使用项目 readme.md 中的命令拉起 csghub 环境，git server 不断重启，日志显示 git server 的镜像刚刚启动进程就会被 kill 掉

```

ubuntu_codename=focal
```

-->
**describe the bug**
use git clone to download paraphrase-multilingual-minilm-l12-v2, fail.

2746521667.search_text:
mac m1  docker one-click deployment guide error follow https://github.com/opencsgs/csghub-installer/tree/main/docker
macos 

```
export server_domain=$(ipconfig getifaddr $(route get default | grep interface | awk '{print $2}'))
export server_port=80
docker run -it -d \
    --name omnibus-csghub \
    --hostname omnibus-csghub \
    -p ${server_port}:80 \
    -p 2222:2222 \
    -p 8000:8000 \
    -p 9000:9000 \
    -v ~/documents/csghub/data:/var/opt \
    -v ~/documents/csghub/log:/var/log \
    -e server_domain=${server_domain} \
    -e server_port=${server_port} \
    opencsg-registry.cn-beijing.cr.aliyuncs.com/opencsg_public/omnibus-csghub:latest

2667439478.title: The size of the custom tab bars on the homepage changes
2667439478.summary: The size of the custom tab bars on the homepage changes When you click on the homepage of OpenCSG,
2667439478.search_text:
the size of the custom tab bars on the homepage changes when you click on the homepage of opencsg, the custom-created tags initially appear as large bars, then gradually refresh to smaller bars one by one until all the tab bars become small.


1. create some customed tags.
2. click the homepage or model lists in opencsg
3. show  tags on left side

version:0.7.0

2651279593.title: Clone Application Space fail
2651279593.summary:
Clone Application Space fail <!--
Please submit your issue in English to ensure it's addressed
2651279593.search_text:
clone application space fail <!--
please submit your issue in english to ensure it's addressed promptly and efficiently.
-->
clone application space fail with authentication failed error

**environment**
https://opencsg.com/


**to reproduce**
steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. creat a simple grario app space
2. clone application space
   copy git clone command, whatever use my token or not, git command fail with authentication failed error

   error message as following
    _cloning into 'testspace'...
    fatal: authentication failed for 'https://opencsg.com/spaces/johnli/testspace.git/'_

2757850848.title: CodeSouler login issue
2757850848.summary:
CodeSouler login issue <!--
Please submit your issue in English to ensure it's addressed promptly
2757850848.search_text: codesouler login issue **describe the bug** codesouler sign in could not refresh after login in opencsg loginpage **environment** os: windows | windsurf with codesouler plugin **to reproduce** steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. click codesouler plugin in windsurf 2. click on 'sign in' button, go to opencsg.com login page 3. enter user/pwd, login success page show up 'https://opencsg.com/ide-login-success' ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/978238ce-e9d4-4d2d-9a1a-ce9fb13ed644) 5. no any action in codesouler plugin login page it happens randomly, once i tried again, everything goes well, so log a issue to track that. **expected behavior** codesouler should login succeful.

2642975947.search_text: model files tab can't open **describe the bug** open a model and navigate to files tab, it will redirect to 404 page. i also noticed the api call 500 error it seems the last commit is nil but the code not handle it **environment** csghub version: latest os: macos hardware: m2 pro launch: vscode **screenshots** **additional context**

2604431506.title: Support using default branch from API details instead of "main" for repo file series
2604431506.summary:
Support using default branch from API details instead of "main" for repo file series <!--
Please
2604431506.search_text:
support using default branch from api details instead of "main" for repo file series <!--
please submit the pull requests in english to ensure smooth communication and quicker review process.
-->


currently, the repo file series defaults to using "main" as the branch name. however, this may not always be accurate for all repositories.

feature request:
update the repo file series to use the default branch information returned by the repository details api, rather than assuming "main" as the default branch.

this change would improve accuracy and flexibility, especially for repositories that use different naming conventions for their default branch.

2581514492.title: Suspicious Increase in Stars on This Repository
2581514492.summary: Suspicious Increase in Stars on This Repository I have noticed unusual activity on your repository
2581514492.search_text:
suspicious increase in stars on this repository i have noticed unusual activity on your repository recently. in the past three days, there is a sudden notable increase in github stars. many of these stars come from accounts that appear to be bots or fake users. their profiles are filled with irrelevant or spam content. this is very suspicious.

as a long-time github lover and ai researcher, i am truly concerned about this behavior. artificially boosting stars is against github policies and harms the integrity of the community. it is important that all users follow the rules and maintain fairness.

i kindly ask you to address this issue and stop any activities that violate github guidelines. i have already reported this matter to the github official team and the community moderators for further investigation.

hope this helps!

2372146489.title: 【BUG】组织数据集无法相互访问
2372146489.summary:
【BUG】组织数据集无法相互访问 ## 问题描述
部署方式使用：`docker compose -f all-in-one.yml up -d`
1.
keywords: 组织数据集无法相互访问
2372146489.search_text:
【bug】组织数据集无法相互访问 ## 问题描述
部署方式使用：`docker compose -f all-in-one.yml up -d`
1. 组织中的任意一个用户创建数据集（所有者为组织），组织内其他用户不可见
2. 点击组织首页中，创建组织的用户同样看不到任何数据集
3. 设置public后 所有用户均可见（包含未登录用户），失去组织的约束

2459156794.title: Feature Request: Support for Additional File Formats in Data Preview
2459156794.summary:
Feature Request: Support for Additional File Formats in Data Preview Hello CSGHub Team,

I hope
2459156794.search_text:
feature request: support for additional file formats in data preview hello csghub team,

i hope this message finds you well. i've been exploring the csghub platform and i'm impressed with its capabilities, especially in managing large model assets and datasets. it's evident that a lot of thought and effort has gone into making csghub a comprehensive asset management platform.

one area where i believe csghub could be enhanced is in the support for additional file formats in the dataset preview functionality. currently, csghub provides excellent support for previewing datasets in common formats. however, as datasets become increasingly complex and diverse, the need to support additional formats becomes apparent.

**enhancement request**:
i would like to request the addition of support for the following file formats in the dataset preview functionality:
- hdf5 (.h5)
- apache parquet (.parquet)
- avro (.avro)

these formats are widely used in the data science and machine learning communities for storing large, complex datasets. supporting these formats would significantly enhance the usability of csghub for a broader audience and facilitate more efficient data exploration and management.

**justification**:
- **hdf5**: widely used in academia and industry for storing large datasets, especially in the fields of physics, astronomy, and bioinformatics.
- **apache parquet**: offers efficient data compression and encoding schemes. it's heavily adopted in data engineering pipelines and supports schema evolution.
- **avro**: a row-based storage format that's ideal for data serialization. it's commonly used in data streaming architectures.

**potential implementation**:
while i understand that adding support for these formats might require considerable effort, perhaps starting with hdf5, given its widespread use, could be a beneficial first step. utilizing existing open-source libraries for reading these formats could also streamline the implementation process.

i believe that extending dataset preview capabilities to include these formats would make csghub even more versatile and valuable to the data science and machine learning communities.

thank you for considering this enhancement request. i'm looking forward to seeing how csghub continues to evolve and meet the needs of its users.

2459500969.search_text:
fr: enhance large dataset management capabilities ### summary

as the platform continues to evolve as a comprehensive asset management tool for large models, including datasets, model files, and code, one area that could significantly benefit from enhancement is the management of large datasets. users currently face challenges when uploading, processing, and managing extensive datasets, which can hinder the efficiency and effectiveness of data-driven projects.

### feature description

the proposed feature aims to introduce a more robust set of tools and functionalities specifically designed to improve the management of large datasets. these enhancements could include:

- **improved upload mechanisms**: implementing a more efficient upload process for large datasets, possibly through chunked uploads or parallel processing, to reduce upload times and minimize timeouts or failures.

- **dataset version control**: introducing version control for datasets similar to model files. this feature would allow users to track changes, revert to previous versions, and understand the evolution of their datasets over time.

- **advanced dataset processing tools**: offering built-in tools for common dataset preprocessing tasks (e.g., normalization, cleaning, splitting) directly within the platform. this would reduce the need for external tools and streamline the data preparation process.

- **enhanced dataset visualization and exploration**: developing interactive tools for users to visualize and explore their datasets within the platform. features could include basic statistical analysis, sample data views, and filtering capabilities.

- **dataset sharing and collaboration**: facilitating easier sharing and collaboration on datasets within teams or the broader community. this could involve permission settings, dataset sharing links, or integration with external collaboration tools.

### impact

implementing these enhancements would significantly improve the user experience for those working with large datasets on the csghub platform. it would streamline the data management process, encourage more collaborative and iterative data science workflows, and ultimately contribute to the development of more effective and impactful machine learning models.

### additional context

given the platform's focus on serving as a "one-stop hub" for large model assets, enhancing dataset management capabilities aligns with the project's core mission. it addresses a critical need within the community and leverages the platform's existing infrastructure to provide even greater value to its users.

---

looking forward to the community's input on this feature request and any additional suggestions or considerations that could further improve dataset management within csghub.

2351103419.title: 上传文件时遇到的一系列bug
2351103419.summary:
上传文件时遇到的一系列bug 在自己要上传的文件夹里面
1. git init  ----要初始化
2. git add
3. git remote add origin
2351103419.search_text:
上传文件时遇到的一系列bug 在自己要上传的文件夹里面
1. git init  ----要初始化
2. git add
3. git remote add origin http://xxxx/xxxx/xxxx/xx.git   ----要传上去的地址 可以在下载按钮里看
4. git config --global user.email “xxxx”
5. git config --global user.name "xxxx"
6. git commit -m "commit message"
7. git push --set-upstream origin main  ----这里要填username 就是注册的用户名 password不是密码是用户管理页面的“git token”
8.  如果出现! [rejected]        main -> main (non-fast-forward)
error: failed to push some refs to 'http://xxxx/xxxx/xxxx/xx.git'
hint: updates were rejected because the tip of your current branch is behind
hint: its remote counterpart. integrate the remote changes (e.g.
hint: 'git pull ...') before pushing again.
hint: see the 'note about fast-forwards' in 'git push --help' for details.
就打命令git pull origin main --allow-unrelated-histories 将本地没有的文件先跟远程仓库对齐
我用的linux会出现个修改文件，它已经改好了，直接按ctrl+x退出再回车就保存了，效果如下
merge made by the 'recursive' strategy.
 .gitattributes | 56 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
 readme.md      |  5 +++++
 2 files changed, 61 insertions(+)
 create mode 100644 .gitattributes
 create mode 100644 readme.md
9. 最后再输一遍步骤7就可以啦！累死老子了，下面是上传成功的反馈
counting objects: 5, done.
delta compression using up to 104 threads.
compressing objects: 100% (4/4), done.
writing objects: 100% (5/5), 9.30 mib | 18.70 mib/s, done.
total 5 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0)
remote: . processing 1 references
remote: processed 1 references in total
to http://xxxx/xxxx/xxxx/xx.git
   6da3105..c49990c  main -> main
branch 'main' set up to track remote branch 'main' from 'origin'.
